    • uniqueColor

      public static java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> uniqueColor()
      Get a (somewhat) unique ANSI color. Will always generate the same sequence of colors. It cannot be truly unique since we track a limited number of colors. Can be reset to the start with reset()
      Returns:
      a function to apply an ANSI color to a string

    • reset

      public static void reset()
      Reset the colors so that uniqueColor() starts from the beginning
